text: Balance a cup on your head for 10 seconds
Hold a plank position for 15 seconds
Sing a chorus from a popular song, if anyone guesses it you win
Spin around 15 times and walk a straight line without spilling your drink
Play rock-paper-scissors with another player, loser drinks
Your next answer must be in pig latin, if you don't you drink, if you do everyone else drinks
Act out a movie, if anyone guesses it you win
Act out a meme, if the group guesses it you win
You must keep a straight face until the end of your turn
You must freeze and not move until the end of your turn, if you cant, you lose
